pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, June 19, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

    • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 1:00 p.m.

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a Muslim Leadership roundtable.

Closed to media

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at an Eid al-Fitr celebration.

Sir John A. Macdonald Building
144 Wellington Street

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage for remarks
    • Media should arrive no later than 5:30 p.m.
